entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Bouctouche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:55 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kouchibouguac 7:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: -11.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -13.1°C
Wind: SE 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to ice pellets or freezing rain near noon then to rain in the afternoon. Fog patches developing in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 cm. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Temperature rising to 9 in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Fog patches. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to 9 in the evening then falling. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023
